resources.string: Currently I am pursing Bachelor of Technology, focused in Electrical Engineering from JSPM\'s Rajarshi Shahu College of Engineering, Pune. Passionate about Programming and Problem solving skills with Data Structure & Algoritham in CPP. 5-star in C++ on HackerRank. President at EESA ( Electrical Engineering Student\'s Association of JSPM\'s RSCOE ). Always inclined towards learning with positive mindset.
